## strip() function

Correct the given number to specifying significant digits.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function strip(num: NumberType, precision?: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

num

</td><td>

NumberType

</td><td>

The input number

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

precision

</td><td>

number

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An integer specifying the number of significant digits

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

## Example

strip(0.09999999999999998) === 0.1 // true
